name: Bread Quest 1 Early Access
description:
Follow Bread warrior on his quest for peace between the Bread and Toast Kingdoms! You will discover lots of things along the way, and of course, make sure not to die!

This game is only on itch.io so make to get it before anything happens!

This game is only early access and will be updated soon! You can purchase now and get access to the full game when it releases!

Warning: This is early access so the campaign is not fully finished and it could have some bugs!

Early access includes:

•free access to the full version when it releases!

•Campaign (Not fully complete)

•Infinite mode (More maps coming)

•More weapons

And more!
